translations: v．使机械化：将（生产过程、工作等）变得自动化或机械化。
· The factory mechanizes the production process to increase efficiency.
工厂将生产过程机械化以提高效率。

sentences.sentence: Rather than type and re-type a (potentially) complex series of commands to accomplish a chore, a shell script mechanizes the work.
sentences.translation: 与输入或重新输入(可能)复杂的命令来完成某个繁琐任务不同，shell脚本可以自动化该工作。
